results.title: The effect of metformin on low birth weight girls with precocious puberty: A protocol for systematic review and meta-analysis
results.text_hl: The effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on low birth weight girls with @<m>DISEASE_Puberty_Precocious</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011629 @@@precocious puberty@@@: A protocol for systematic review and meta-analysis

citations.NLM: Lin Z, Sui X, Li L, Wang Y, Zhao J. The effect of metformin on low birth weight girls with precocious puberty: A protocol for systematic review and meta-analysis Medicine (Baltimore). 2022 Jul 1;101(26):e29765. PMID: 35776991

results.title: Metformin treatment of juvenile mice alters aging-related developmental and metabolic phenotypes.
results.text_hl: Accumulating evidence suggests that the influence on developmental traits might have long-term effects on aging and health later in life. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ is a widely used drug for treating @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@ and is also used for delaying sexual maturation in girls with @<m>DISEASE_Puberty_Precocious</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011629 @@@precocious puberty@@@.

citations.NLM: Zhu Y, Fang Y, Medina D, Bartke A, Yuan R. Metformin treatment of juvenile mice alters aging-related developmental and metabolic phenotypes. Mech Ageing Dev. 2022 Jan;201():111597. PMID: 34780856
citations.BibTeX: @article{34780856, title={Metformin treatment of juvenile mice alters aging-related developmental and metabolic phenotypes.}, author={Zhu Y and Fang Y and Medina D and Bartke A and Yuan R}, journal={Mech Ageing Dev}, volume={201}, pages={111597}}

results.title: Metformin in Reproductive Biology
results.text_hl: In females with early symptoms of @<m>DISEASE_Puberty_Precocious</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011629 @@@precocious puberty@@@ associated with @DISEASE_Hyperinsulinism @DISEASE_MESH:D006946 @@@hyperinsulinemia@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ administration has been shown to delay the onset of clinical puberty and the pubertal increase in @GENE_IGF1 @GENE_3479 @@@IGF1@@@ levels.

citations.NLM: Faure M, Bertoldo MJ, Khoueiry R, Bongrani A, Brion F, Giulivi C, Dupont J, Froment P. Metformin in Reproductive Biology Front Endocrinol (Lausanne). 2018;9():675. PMID: 30524372
